content: double_crochet round 4 slip_stitch to first fpdc from prevoius round chain 1 single_crochet in same st skip 2 sts those are the 2 double_crochet from prev round 7 double_crochet in next fpdc *skip 2 sts single_crochet in next fpdc skip 2 sts 7 double_crochet in next fpdc* repeat *to* to end join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet 6 single_crochet 6 petals of 7 double_crochet fasten_off round 5 change colour join in any single_crochet from previous round chain 2 1 fpdc around the same st 1 bphdc in next 2 sts 1 bpsc in next 3 sts 1 bphdc in next 2 sts *1 fpdc in next st note that s a single_crochet from previous round 1 bphdc in next 2 sts 1 bpsc in next 3 sts 1 bphdc in next 2 sts* repeat *to* to end join with a slip_stitch to first fpdc 6 fpdc 24 bphdc 18 bpsc round 6 chain 2 1 fpdc around the same st 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts *1 fpdc in next st note that s a fpdc from previous round 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts* repeat *to* to end join with a slip_stitch to first fpdc 6 fpdc 24 half_double_crochet 18 single_crochet fasten_off if you want to change colour round 7 if you change colour join in the 3rd st to the left of any fpdc if you don t change colour just slip_stitch in the next 3 st which is the 3rd st to the left of the fpdc from previous round chain 3 1 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in the same st this is the first corner 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts *2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts* repeat * to* to end join with a slip_stitch to top of chain 3 32 double_crochet 16 half_double_crochet 12 single_crochet 4 chain 2 space k a m e crochet designs 2019 by krisztina anna matejcsok-edomer all rights reserved round 8 slip_stitch to next st slip_stitch to chain 2 corner space chain 3 1 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in the same space 1 half_double_crochet in all sts until you reach next corner space *2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in chain 2 corner space 1 half_double_crochet in all sts until next corner* repeat *to* join with a slip_stitch to top of chain 3 16 double_crochet 60 half_double_crochet 4 chain 2 space fasten_off if you want to change colour round 9 if you change colour join to any chain 2 corner space if you don t change
